data.title: Shows & events
data.meta_description: The Segerstrom Center for the Arts presents world-renowned artists as well as community-focused events. We offer a diverse range of experiences for patrons of all ages, tastes, and interests.
data.text:
600 Town Center Drive,

Costa Mesa, CA 92626

Directions

Phone:

Mondayâ€“Friday: 10am to 5pm (714) 556-2787

On Saturdays and Sundays when we have a performance, we will be open beginning 2 hours before the first performance until 30 minutes after the latest performance time. When there is no performance, we are closed.
